Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm, this is a detailed and well-structured supply chain description.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The user wants 20 open-ended questions that dig deeper into insights, issues, improvements, and decision implications. The questions should avoid SQL or technical solutions and instead provoke strategic thinking.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Ill categorize the questions to cover the full spectrum of the supply chainâ€”sourcing, manufacturing, logistics, distribution, and overarching strategy.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Each question should challenge assumptions or explore trade-offs. For example, how would geopolitical risks affect component sourcing? What if automation displaces workers? How do we balance cost and sustainability in shipping?

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The questions should also touch on emerging trends like AI, circular economy, and regulatory changes. Ill avoid closed-ended questions and ensure each one encourages discussion or analysis. The goal is to make the user reflect on hidden complexities and potential innovations.
